    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Arrow(double arrowTailRadius, Double3D startPoint, Double3D endPoint, java.lang.String stLabel, java.lang.String endLabel, javax.media.j3d.Appearance appearance)
      Creates a 3D arrow between points startPoint and endPoint if either label is not null, it adds a Text2D object at the appropriate end.
